HeaderHero.title: The essence of UX isn't simply crafting experiences; it's about empathizing with people to create truly unique moments.
HeaderHero.frase: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.

ProjectsList.descpro1: Brought to life a dynamic web platform that simplifies booking hotels, arranging transfers, and discovering unforgettable travel experiences.
ProjectsList.descpro2: Designed a mobile app dedicated to enhancing the padel match experience through intuitive control and score tracking. This project focused on creating a clean and functional interface for players to effortlessly manage their games.

Skills.descS1: I design intuitive user experiences and aesthetic user interfaces. My focus is on usability, accessibility, and effective problem-solving through a user-centered design approach.
Skills.descS2: We accelerate your online growth. Our digital marketing service is designed to help you attract more clients, enhance your brand's visibility, and convert website visitors into sales, leveraging proven strategies across SEO, SEM, social media, and content.
Skills.descS3: Accelerate your digital transformation. We offer strategic consulting to help businesses modernize operations, enhance customer engagement, and unlock new value through technology.

Contact.title: Contact me
Contact.descCont: If you have any questions about my experience or services, please get in touch and I'll be happy to help you.
